CustomField.formula:
/*IF( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATE(2022,05,24) , IF(NOT( ISBLANK(Qantas_Frequent_Flyer_Number__c) ),(((ordexp_total_payment_received__c + Total_Order_OLI_Coupon__c - ordexp_total_refund_amount__c - Total_Coupon_Amount__c ) - QFF_Cash__c) * 3), 0), 0) */
IF( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATE(2022,05,24) , IF(NOT( ISBLANK(Qantas_Frequent_Flyer_Number__c) ),(((ordexp_total_payment_received__c + Total_Order_OLI_Coupon__c - ordexp_total_refund_amount__c - Total_Coupon_Amount__c ) - QFF_Cash__c) * (IF( (Deal_Name__c='4199' && DATEVALUE(ordexp_purchase_date__c) >= DATE(2023,09,27) && DATEVALUE(ordexp_purchase_date__c) <= DATE(2023,10,07) ) || (Deal_Name__c='5032' && DATEVALUE(ordexp_purchase_date__c) >= DATE(2023,11,01) && DATEVALUE(ordexp_purchase_date__c) <= DATE(2023,11,17) ) || (Deal_Name__c='4254' && DATEVALUE(ordexp_purchase_date__c) >= DATE(2023,09,27) && DATEVALUE(ordexp_purchase_date__c) <= DATE(2023,10,07) ) , 9, 3) ) ), 0), 0) + IF( (ordexp_account__r.Off_Bonus_Point__c = true || Is_Qf_Order__c=true ) && DATEVALUE(ordexp_purchase_date__c) >= DATE(2023,11,09) && DATEVALUE(ordexp_purchase_date__c) <= DATE(2023,11,15) , 5000, 0)
CustomField.label: QFF Points
